sen.j: 逸見勝三郎（いつみかつさぶろう、生年不詳～明治元年（1868年）1月5日）は新選組隊士。
sen.e: Katsusaburo ITSUMI (year of birth is not clear - January 5, 1868) was a member of Shinsengumi.
Katsusaburo ITSUMI (year of birth is not clear - January 5, 1868) was a member of Shinsengumi.
Katsusaburo ITSUMI (year of birth is not clear - January 29, 1868) was a member of Shinsengumi.
His family name could be HENMI.
His family name could be HENMI.
His family name could be Henmi.
He hailed from Edo.
He hailed from Edo.
He hailed from Edo.

sen.j: 慶応元年5月の江戸における隊士募集に応じ入隊。
sen.e: He joined Shinsengumi in response to the recruitment of new members that was conducted in Edo in May of 1865.
He joined Shinsengumi in response to the recruitment of new members that was conducted in Edo in May of 1865.
He joined Shinsengumi in response to the recruitment of new members that was conducted in Edo in May of 1865.

sen.j: 慶応3年6月10日の幕府召抱えでは平同士として名を連ねている。
sen.e: He was listed as a rank-and-file member in the name list that was compiled on June 10, 1867 when Shinsengumi was employed by bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun).
He was listed as a rank-and-file member in the name list that was compiled on June 10, 1867 when Shinsengumi was employed by bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun).
He was listed as a rank-and-file member in the name list that was compiled on July 11, 1867 when Shinsengumi was employed by bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun).

sen.j: 慶応4年1月3日から始まった鳥羽・伏見の戦いを経て1月5日淀千両松の戦いにて戦死する。
sen.e: After fighting the Battle of Toba-Fushimi that started on January 3, 1968, he was killed in the Battle of Yodo-Senryomatsu on January 5.
After fighting the Battle of Toba-Fushimi that started on January 3, 1968, he was killed in the Battle of Yodo-Senryomatsu on January 5.
After fighting the Battle of Toba-Fushimi that started on January 27, 1968, he was killed in the Battle of Yodo Senryomatsu on January 29.
sen.cmt: 新暦に訂正しました。Yodo Senryomatsuに訂正しました。

sen.j: 御香宮神社の名簿に名がある。
sen.e: He was listed in the name list of Gokonomiya-jinja Shrine.
He was listed in the name list of Gokonomiya-jinja Shrine.
He was listed in the name list of Gokonomiya-jinja Shrine.
